jcurses.widgets
类 WidgetUtilities

java.lang.Object
  jcurses.widgets.WidgetUtilities

public class WidgetUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

WidgetUtilities contains utility methods for the jcurses library.

WidgetUtilities

方法详细信息

invokeAndWait

public static void invokeAndWait(java.lang.Runnable r)
Method to be used by external threads wishing to perform safe calls to jcurses widgets. A typical jcurses application only requires the built-in jcurses input thread and need not use this method.

参数：
r - a Runnable containing the code to be executed in a thread-safe manner.
